name: Mini Mine Survival Rush
description:
Mini Mine Survival is an addicting physics based game that's fun for everyone! Your goal is to clear as many mines as you can to increase your score!

HOW TO PLAY:

Point your equipment at the mines underground and press when you want it to extend. The claw will reach out and pick up your mines to redeem for prizes!

Features include:

• Beautiful, fun graphics
• Smooth physics for nice gameplay
• Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
• Multiple levels to play!

Download right now!
